name: Broccoli Potato Soup
description: I loved this recipe so much the first time I decided to make it for Thanksgiving. I doubled the recipe and got some enthusiastic feedback from my family

name: Monster Bites
description: A simple and yummy Halloween treat made with apples and peanut butter.

name: Chipotle Barbacoa
description: This is as close to a certain big chain's barbacoa meat I have ever made! It is full of intense flavors such as garlic, cayenne, and sweet, smoky chipotle

name: Dreamy Chicken
description: This is a fabulous main dish and is company worthy. Serve with rice and a cooked vegetable for a complete meal. Word of warning: it is not diet friendly

name: Magical Egg Salad
description: Creamy egg salad with a little tang

name: Southern Stir-Fry
description: Who says stir-fry has to be Asian? Enjoy this zesty blend of rice, corn, black-eyed peas, and spinach.
